WORK EXPERIENCE

Develop ideas, build and design functions, interfaces for applications according to ideas or 
follow customer requirements, maintaining applications on store.

requests

Guide and support students to practice.

Manage progress, write project documents, plan,…

programmer 
- 
Analyzing requirements, programming applications on Android platform.  
- 
Build code-base Android, React native. 
- 
Working with AEON customers,… 
Also involved in developing freelance applications (Android). 
KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS  
- 
Programming languages: JAVA, javascript, C#, C++,… 
- 
Framework: Android, React Native,... 
- 
Android: UI customize, optimize performance, Push notification FCM, Google API, Local 
Storage, Android enviroment (Activity, Fragment, lifecycle), use libraries, MVP, multi 
languages, multi screen, publish app Google Play, Networking, navigation,Map , write code 
base, caching data,… 
- 
React-Native: write code base, react component, navigation, redux, middleware, selector, 
networking with axios, optimize performace, style with flex box, multi-language,caching 
data,… 
- 
Having knowledge of data structures, algorithms, design patterns, OOP, clean code, 
architecture,… 
- 
Analysis, application design, wireframe , UI/UX ,… 
- 
Restful API. 
- 
Managing source code with GIT. 
- 
Writing required documents, designing software. 
- 
Manage progress with WBS, redmine,… 
CAREER GOALS  
The career goal in the next 3 years is to become a software developer, can build software, 
manage projects, work with customers. 
DESIRE FOR WORK 
Comfortable working environment, can propose ideas, evaluate public capacity and accuracy. 
Appropriate salary, increase according to capacity. Clearing and insurance policies. 
PERSONAL HOBBY  
Watch movies, read books, follow and learn new technologies.
